src:
Dejvis o igranju za Bulse: Slobodan sam agent narednog leta…
05 Nov 2019, 10:32 by Nemanja
Košarkaš Los Anđeles Lejkersa Entoni Dejvis nije odbacio mogućnost da u skorije vreme zaigra za tim iz svog rodnog grada – Čikago Bulse.
Iako je stigao u Los Anđeles minulog leta i za sada čini sjajan tandem sa Lebronom Džejmsom, Dejvis bi voleo da zaigra za Čikago Bulse u budućnosti, ali pitanje je kada će se to tačno dogoditi.
On je na gostovanju u jednoj srednjoj školi u Čikagu, gde Lejkersi igraju naredne večeri, dobio pitanje učenika hoće li se vratiti u rodni grad i zaigrati za Bulse.
  – Mislim, slobodan sam agent narednog leta…Ali, videćemo – rekao je Dejvis uz osmeh.
Popularna ,,Obrva“ je takođe nazvao Čikago ,,Mekom košarke“.
 – Pravili smo najbolje košarkaše kroz istoriju. Ukoliko zaista pogledate istoriju možete videti sve te momke koji su osvajali prstenje ili koji čak i nisu, a bili su veliki. Mnogi kažu da je Njujork centar košarke, ali nisu ni blizu – rekao je Dejvis.
Dejvis je ove sezone peti strelac šampionata sa 28.5 poena po meču, a njegovi Lejkersi za sada imaju skor od 5:1 pred gostovanje Bulsima.
text:
Davis on playing for the Bulls: I'm a free agent next summer ...
05 Nov 2019, 10:32 by Nemanja
Los Angeles Lakers basketball player Anthony Davis has not ruled out the possibility of playing for his hometown team - the Chicago Bulls - recently.
Although he arrived in Los Angeles last summer and is making a great tandem with Lebron James for the time being, Davis would love to play for the Chicago Bulls in the future, but the question is when exactly will that happen.
He made a guest appearance at a Chicago high school where the Lakers played the following evening, got a student question about whether he would return to his hometown and play for the Bulls.
"I mean, I'm a free agent next summer ... But we'll see," Davis said with a smile.
The popular "Eyebrow" also called Chicago the "Basketball Mecca."
- We made the best basketball players in history. If you really look at history you can see all those guys who won the rings or who didn't, and they were big. Many say New York is the center of basketball, but they are nowhere near it, Davis said.
Davis is the fifth goal scorer this season with 28.5 points per game, and his Lakers have a 5-1 scoreline before hosting the Bulls.
